ingredients: 1 Can of Trader Joe's diced fire roasted tomatoes
1 tablespoon Of chopped chipotle in adobo (optional)
2 cups Of Trader Joe's frozen roasted corn
2 cups Of shredded Monterrey Jack cheese
1 tablespoon Of both salt and pepper
1 bottle of Trader Joe's enchilada sauce
6 to 8 Trader Joe's handmade flour tortillas
1/4 cup Of corn or canola oil.
1 Medium sized potato diced into small cubes
